    • DisplayMainMenu

      public static void DisplayMainMenu()
      Parameters:
      Display - the main Menu and possible options Treat any incorrect entry that isn't between 1 or 10 Call the proper method based on selected option

    • addPerson

      public static void addPerson()
      Parameters:
      Prompt - information about a person. The person Object is added to App List Ask if friend should be added, and keep asking for it as long as Y is pressed. After method end, calls DisplayMainMenu method so the program go back to main menu

    • getInputListPosition

      public static int getInputListPosition()
      Parameters:
      Asks - for user to input a position Get a valid position input to be used in add methods

    • removePerson

      public static void removePerson()
      Parameters:
      Call - getInputListPostion to get a valid user Position Gets the Person information and prompt the output informing who was removed Remove Person from all Lists Go back to main Menu

    • clearAllList

      public static void clearAllList()
      Parameters:
      Prompt - User to confirm if want to clear the list or not Only Accepts Y or N answer (lower or capital case) Remove Person from all Lists if confirmed Go back to main Menu If other result than Y or N is provided Recursion to call the method again

    • addPersonInPosition

      public static void addPersonInPosition()
      Parameters:
      Prompt - information about a person. Call the GetInputListPosition method to validate the Position to be added The person Object is added to App List in the correct position Ask if friend should be added, and keep asking for it as long as Y is pressed. After method end, calls DisplayMainMenu method so the program go back to main menu

    • countList

      public static void countList()
      Parameters:
      Call - list method to print the correct length of the list Prompt the number output Goes back to main menu

    • checkEmpty

      public static void checkEmpty()
      Parameters:
      Call - the list isEmpty method Prompt proper output based on result

    • searchForPerson

      public static Person searchForPerson()
      Parameters:
      Ask - for user input Search for the person in appList Return the Person if it is found in the list Prompt proper output based on result

    • addOrRemoveFriend

      public static void addOrRemoveFriend()
      Parameters:
      Call - the searchForPerson Method to check if the person exist Display the Menu and possible options Treat any incorrect entry that isn't between 1 or 3 Call the proper method based on user Choice If invalid choice is made, use recursion to call the function again

    • removeFriend

      public static void removeFriend(Person person)
      Parameters:
      Prompts - User to enter friend name Use contains LinkedList method to find the input in the friends list if the input is different from -1 The user is removed and the output is prompted Otherwise, a prompt advising no friend was found is prompted

    • addFriend

      public static void addFriend(Person person)
      Parameters:
      Prompts - User to enter friend name,email and location use the add method from linkedlist to add the Friends name into the list Prompt confirming that the name was added

    • displayList

      public static void displayList()
      Parameters:
      Call - the toArray linkedlist method if the list isn't empty Traverse through the array to print each person
